meanings.definition: To discard or get rid of something quickly or unceremoniously.
meanings.sent1: I had to shitcans the broken toy before my mom saw it.
meanings.sent2: Please don't just shitcans your homework when you're done with it.
meanings.sent3: He tried to shitcans his vegetables, but the dog found them and made a mess.
meanings.sent4: She decided to shitcans her old habits and start fresh.
meanings.sent5: The wind was so strong that it seemed to shitcans everything in its path.

meanings.definition: A container used for disposing of waste or garbage.
meanings.sent1: The janitor wheeled the shitcans out to empty them.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to put the food scraps in the compost shitcans.
meanings.sent3: The raccoons knocked over the shitcans looking for leftovers.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were lined with overflowing shitcans after the parade.
meanings.sent5: The smell coming from the old shitcans was unbearable.
